title: Can we give Zed some counterplay.
body:
https://gyazo.com/e0402ffc5d13acde48cd6d7dd2bfa0d1
https://gyazo.com/254e451045ed3e883b71087c3f731532
Can we talk about how I built Sterak's, and this Zed could pop 4000 HP off of me with no counterplay.
I get 1 AA off and he dies but he also gets me so now we lose because I'm our only tank killer.
4000 fucking damage in half a second shouldn't be allowed on any champ especially one where if you can see him he can get to you.

replies.body:
Just walk away. 
Or play talon and train him to never ever for the rest of time leave his tower or he is very much not alive now.
Yeah I played Talon into Zed and was shocked at how easily he died pre 6.

2 full item champions, one with no armor and the other with quite a bit of armor pen... yeah no, he should be killing you even if you have sterak's you are already dying and the shield actually decays very fast so it's not really going to help you against someone whose damage is as delayed as Zed's. Get GA which is a lot better against Zed

> [{quoted}](name=ZephyrDrake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-29T16:31:08.172+0000)
>
> 2 full item champions, one with no armor and the other with quite a bit of armor pen... yeah no, he should be killing you even if you have sterak's you are already dying and the shield actually decays very fast so it's not really going to help you against someone whose damage is as delayed as Zed's. Get GA which is a lot better against Zed

i built ga that game as well but it didnt do shit because the armor and mr didnt stop his damage, and the passive was only up every 5 mins while hed kill me 2-3 times during that 5 mins.

> [{quoted}](name=Deaeras,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-01-29T20:42:53.587+0000)
>
> i built ga that game as well but it didnt do shit because the armor and mr didnt stop his damage, and the passive was only up every 5 mins while hed kill me 2-3 times during that 5 mins.

good job on building an even worst item in it's place! GA is not meant to stop the damage but for you to revive with it making his all in be pretty much not worth it as long as your team is decent enough. a God damn Bloodthrister would have been better at that point than sterak, Sterak's is only worth it if you have the resistances to back it up

> [{quoted}](name=ZephyrDrake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2017-01-30T00:21:48.900+0000)
>
> good job on building an even worst item in it's place! GA is not meant to stop the damage but for you to revive with it making his all in be pretty much not worth it as long as your team is decent enough. a God damn Bloodthrister would have been better at that point than sterak, Sterak's is only worth it if you have the resistances to back it up

so theres a teamfight every minute, ga has a 5 minute cd, and over the 3 times it popped that game, not once did it actually save me, because for the 2.5 seconds or whatever im reviving for my team gets demolished and they move in to kill me.

> [{quoted}](name=Deaeras,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-31T16:56:30.400+0000)
>
> so theres a teamfight every minute, ga has a 5 minute cd, and over the 3 times it popped that game, not once did it actually save me, because for the 2.5 seconds or whatever im reviving for my team gets demolished and they move in to kill me.

it doesn't matter, steraks won't save in the slightest. You have no armor and the shield is not going to save you due to it actually rapidly decaying the instant it is activated. So unless the shield is activated by Zed's ult damage you will just die. Why not actually go for something like Randuins or Sunfire or Deadman's? at least they will give you some armor along with the HP so that will help mitigate his damage somewhat and like i said a damn Bloodthrister would have been better than Steraks since the shield doesn't decay and you get a bunch of lifesteal to try and lifesteal your way through his combo. You can keep building steraks, it's a terrible item against anyone that does delayed damage

Probably better off with a ga instead of steraks.  Also you had a ali, if he good he will just sit next to you and knock up/back zed as soon as he ults you.  That is the counterplay btw like most assasins, teamwork.

> [{quoted}](name=I am Pacman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-29T07:18:01.277+0000)
>
> Probably better off with a ga instead of steraks.  Also you had a ali, if he good he will just sit next to you and knock up/back zed as soon as he ults you.  That is the counterplay btw like most assasins, teamwork.

i went ga and i still got bursted out, steraks blocks 1800 dmg on a 60 sec cd, ga puts me in a position to get killed again on a 5 min cd
If you don't get Zhonya's the only other counterplay is to have your support/jungle peel him for you.
You are Jhin. Zed's PRIMARY counter. It's like complaining as {{champion:11}} against a {{champion:33}}

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken Dynasty,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2017-02-01T03:11:21.258+0000)
>
> You are Jhin. Zed's PRIMARY counter. It's like complaining as {{champion:11}} against a {{champion:33}}

when your entire team attempts to counter zed by building approximately 5 items dedicated to stopping him alone along with 4 summoner spells and 100% of your teams focus and he still 1 shots you thats a little unfair.

> [{quoted}](name=bbQ s,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-01-31T20:38:03.171+0000)
>
> There's no way that zed can kill you if you have steraks and a remotely competent alistar support, especially with those items {{item:3401}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3109}} .
> If you get caught alone or the supp doesn't peel for you, it's not zed fault.

i mean at one point in a teamfight he went right in on the middle of my team while alis q was down and did over 4000 dmg in half a second before getting blown up

> [{quoted}](name=bbQ s,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2017-02-01T03:06:42.916+0000)
>
> So what? Do you expect to live through a late game assassin damage without the peel of your team?
> If you alistar had Q or W up, or exhaust, he wouldn't be able to kill you and he'd be useless as fuck.

ummm, at one point he got q'ed by alistar, focused down by my entire team, ulted at 50 health, and proceeded to kill me through steraks, heal, knights vow, face of the mountain, locket, and alistar passive. now idk how much dmg that would be but i know its over 4000, through exhaust, soooo :/
Save your CC for when he comes out of his ulti.  He will always land OPPOSITE TO HIS SHADOW IS. NOT BEHIND.

1. You're completely over exaggerating everything, so lets get that out of the way.
2. Zed should be able to 100-0 squishy adcs because, like, thats his job.
3. You dont get 4000 hp simply from Steraks.
4. Zed's burst window is much more than half a second.
5. Because of this, he actually has quite a bit of counterplay. Why did you ever put yourself in positions where he could 100-0 you? Did you dodge his q's? Did you stand there and let him auto you? Did you know his ult makes him land at a location directly behind you from where he ulted from?

Zed was broken awhile ago, but is currently one of the healthiest champions on the roster. He doesn't instaburst anyone, has lots of counterplay, and can easily be smacked down with some cc since he's fairly squishy himself. I don't see how you can even be mad when you're playing Jhin who CAN LITERALLY ONE SHOT PEOPLE WITH A SINGLE AUTO when Zed takes, usually, atleast 2 seconds to kill someone.

> [{quoted}](name=Deaeras,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-29T07:05:08.386+0000)
>
> https://gyazo.com/e0402ffc5d13acde48cd6d7dd2bfa0d1
> https://gyazo.com/254e451045ed3e883b71087c3f731532
> Can we talk about how I built Sterak&#039;s, and this Zed could pop 4000 HP off of me with no counterplay.
> **I get 1 AA off and he dies** but he also gets me so now we lose because I&#039;m our only tank killer.
> 4000 fucking damage in half a second shouldn&#039;t be allowed on any champ especially one where if you can see him he can get to you.

And you're complaining about Zac's lack of counterplay?

Also this Zac is on your team. Wtf.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-29T16:21:33.527+0000)
>
> And you're complaining about Zac's lack of counterplay?
> 
> Also this Zac is on your team. Wtf.

Zed*, pay attention
Oh. Lol my bad.

{{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3157}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:21}} and pretty much any dash ability to get away from his ult combo
i agree. nerf Zed
Zed is weak as hell right now. Not saying that his kit isn't an utter annoyance to play against.

> [{quoted}](name=MadKnife IV,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h1UVTbfs,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-01-29T16:34:30.679+0000)
>
> Zed is weak as hell right now. Not saying that his kit isn't an utter annoyance to play against.

not that he isnt weak, just that his kit needs more counterplay than "dont get within 1500 units of him"
